name: Land of Bad
description: When a Delta Force team is ambushed in enemy territory, a rookie officer refuses to abandon them. Their only hope lies with an Air Force drone pilot as the eyes in the sky during a brutal 48-hour battle for survival.

name: Extraction 2
description: Back from the brink of death, commando Tyler Rake embarks on a dangerous mission to save a ruthless gangster's imprisoned family.

name: Lone Survivor
description: Marcus Luttrell and three Navy SEALs are sent to locate Taliban leader Ahmad Shah in the Hindu Kush region of Afghanistan, where they become targets of enemy attacks.

name: 12 Strong
description: Captain Mitch Nelson leads an elite team on a mission to fight the Taliban in Afghanistan. As he uses the aid of a local warlord, the situation becomes more dangerous and morally complicated.

name: Jarhead 3
description: While guarding a US embassy in the Middle East, elite Marine Corporal Evan Albright and his unit are caught off guard when a group of terrorists attacks them.

name: 13 Hours
description: A security team consisting of six members fights to defend an American diplomatic compound in Benghazi, Libya, against a wave of terrorist attacks..
